subject: Fwd: ORDER #SSN1525 - Change Request
description_text:
Hello, following up on the below request. Please let me if the order can be changed

Regards,
Angelo Bovino

Begin forwarded message:

From: Angelo Bovino <angelo.bovino@outlook.com>
Date: May 31, 2025 at 9:42:38 PM EDT
To: support@simsonn.com
Subject: ORDER #SSN1525 - Change Request

﻿
Hello, I am contacting you in regards to ORDER #SSN1525.

I noticed that the order is still, "Unfulfilled" and I wanted to see if it's possible to make a change to the order

I would like to order the, "Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal" Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 with Baseplate (As seen on this page: https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714)

And I would like to cancel the Plus X P3-H3 Black with Baseplate
Please let me know if this is still possible. Thanks.

Regards,
Angelo Bovino

conversations.body_text: Hi Angelo Bovino,      The shipment has already been dispatched by our freight forwarder and can no longer be changed at this point. Thank you for your understanding.
